Alpha Vantage.dsc: Provides real-time and historical data on stocks, currencies, and cryptocurrencies.
Alpha Vantage.limit: Free tier allows up to 5 API requests per minute and 500 requests per day.

Finnhub.dsc: Provides stock, forex, and cryptocurrency data, including news and sentiment analysis.
Finnhub.limit: Free tier allows 60 API calls per minute.

Polygon.io.dsc: Real-time and historical stock, forex, and cryptocurrency market data.
Polygon.io.limit: Free plan allows limited access to data and APIs.
